name: wp-aws-filemanager
description: Small script who's permit to export wp img to aws

scripts.list: npm run build && node dist/index.js list
scripts.migrate: npm run build && node dist/index.js migrate
scripts.dry-run: npm run build && node dist/index.js dry-run
scripts.rollback: npm run build && node dist/index.js rollback
scripts.update-elementor-data: npm run build && node dist/index.js update-elementor-data
